name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-46_teams-auth-csharp
title: .NET Bot with Teams Authentication
shortDescription: Simple bot uses Auth Dialog or Teams SSO to authenticate the user
longDescription: Simple bot shows how to get started with authentication in a bot for Microsoft Teams

references.name: Teams development videos from the community

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-50_teams-messaging-extensions-search-csharp
title: .NET Teams Search Messaging Extension
shortDescription: Sample illustrates how to build a Search-based Messaging Extension
longDescription: Sample illustrates how to build a Search-based Messaging Extension. Messaging extensions are implemented using the Azure Bot Framework.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-51_teams-messaging-extensions-action-csharp
title: .NET Teams Action Messaging Extension
shortDescription: Sample illustrates how to build an Action-based Messaging Extension
longDescription: Simple Teams action messaging extension. Messaging extensions are based on the Azure Bot Framework.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-52_teams-messaging-extensions-search-auth-config-csharp
title: .NET Search Messaging Extension with Config Page and Authentication
shortDescription: Search messaging extension including a configuration page and Bot service authentication
longDescription: Sample shows how to use a Messaging Extension configuration page, as well as how to sign into an OAuth2 provider from a search Messaging Extension.

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-53_teams-messaging-extensions-action-preview-csharp
title: .NET Messaging Extension, Bot sends on behalf of a user
shortDescription: Messaging extension shows a card and bot sends on behalf of a user
longDescription: This sample hows how to create a simple card based on parameters entered by the user from a Task Module. It also displays the scenario where a Bot sends messages on behalf of a User.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-54_teams-task-module-csharp
title: .NET Teams Task Module with Bot Framework
shortDescription: Dislay a Task Module from Hero or Adaptive Card buttons and receive input from the Task Module in the bot
longDescription: Sample shows how to fetch a Task Module from Hero Card or Adaptive Card buttons and receive input from the Task Module in the bot

references.name: Teams development videos from the community

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-55_teams-link-unfurling-csharp
title: .NET Teams Link Unfurling
shortDescription: Messaging extension that customizes the view of hyperlinks in conversation
longDescription: Sample messaging extension that customizes the view of hyperlinks matching a particular hostname

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-56_teams-file-upload-csharp
title: .NET Teams File Upload Bot
shortDescription: Simple bot for Microsoft Teams shows how to upload files
longDescription: Sample shows how to upload files to Teams from a bot and how to receive a file sent to a bot as an attachment. It also shows how to fetch inline images sent in message.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-botbuilder-57_teams-conversation-bot-csharp
title: .NET Teams Conversation Bot
shortDescription: Sample shows how to incorporate basic conversational flow into a Teams application. It also illustrates a few of the Teams specific calls you can make from your bot.
longDescription: Simple bot with conversational flow demonstrates how to display a welcome card, mention the user and message all members in a conversation

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
